description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The object of Blast is to shoot the ball through a series of moving systems. Shoot the ball from the current green barrel to the yellow barrel using the barrels in between. The game speeds up each level so shoot carefully!
